achievements.title: Backend Development Course
achievements.description: Focused on secure transaction protocols, e-commerce systems, API development, authentication mechanisms, and database design for production-ready applications.

achievements.title: MERN Stack Web Development
achievements.description: Comprehensive certification covering MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js. Completed full-stack projects demonstrating proficiency in modern web development technologies.

achievements.title: Programming in C and Java
achievements.description: Certification in fundamental programming concepts, data structures, algorithms, and object-oriented programming using C and Java languages.

achievements.title: Decode Data Science With Machine Learning
achievements.description: Completed comprehensive course covering Python for data science, NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, data visualization, and exploratory data analysis techniques.

achievements.title: Smart India Hackathon 2025 Participant
achievements.description: Worked on Digital Health Record Management system for migrant workers in Kerala. Collaborated with team to develop a comprehensive solution addressing healthcare accessibility and data management.
